description.english: Welcome to 2019, remember what was going on there?
description.russian: Добро пожаловать в 2019 год!
description.token: Welcome to 2019, remember what was going on there?

description.english: When the game prompts you to choose a character in the supermarket, select "Mysterious".
description.russian: Когда игра предложит вам переключиться, выберите да.
description.ukrainian: Коли гра запропонує вам переключитися, виберіть так.
description.token: When the game prompts you to choose a character in the supermarket, select "Mysterious".

description.english: When the game prompts you to choose a character in the supermarket, select "Mickey".
description.russian: Когда игра предложит вам переключиться, выберите нет.
description.ukrainian: Коли гра запропонує вам переключитися, виберіть ні.
description.token: When the game prompts you to choose a character in the supermarket, select "Mickey".

description.english: If I'm L, are you Kira?
description.russian: Если я L, то ты Кира?
description.ukrainian: Якщо я L, то ти Кіра?
description.token: If I'm L, are you Kira?

description.english: You killed Mickey and let the orderly take over the world.
description.russian: Вы убили Микки и позволили санитаром захватит власть во всем мире.
description.ukrainian: Ви вбили Міккі і дозволили санітарам захопить владу в усьому світі.
description.token: You killed Mickey and let the orderly take over the world.

description.english: Just don't put anyone in the meat grinder.
description.russian: Только не надо никого отправлять в мясорубку.
description.token: Just don't put anyone in the meat grinder.

description.english: Your first spilled blood, congratulations!
description.russian: Ваша первая пролитая кровь, поздравляю!
description.token: Your first spilled blood, congratulations!

description.english: You've waited two whole years for this moment, how are you not old yet?
description.russian: Ты ждал этого момента целых два года, как ты еще не состарился?
description.token: You've waited two whole years for this moment, how are you not old yet?

description.english: Give me your discord, I want to hum to you.
description.russian: Дай мне свой дискордик, я хочу тебе помурчать.
description.token: Give me your discord, I want to hum to you.

description.english: Is there any way to save him?
description.russian: Есть ли способ спасти его?
description.token: Is there any way to save him?

description.english: I really want to go to 10th and 11th grade.
description.russian: Я очень хочу учиться в 10 и 11 классах.
description.token: I really want to go to 10th and 11th grade.

description.english: Mom, I really want to leave after 9th grade.
description.russian: Мама, я очень хочу уйти после 9-го класса.
description.token: Mom, I really want to leave after 9th grade.

description.english: Got the one who bit.
description.russian: Попался тот, кто кусался.
description.token: NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_8_2_DESC

description.english: Only the strongest will make the hardest choice.
description.russian: Сложнейший выбор сделает лишь сильнейший.
description.token: Only the strongest will make the hardest choice.

description.english: This is a description, there's a lot of text, if you can't see it, buy glasses.
description.russian: Это описание, здесь много текста, если вы его не видите, купите очки.
description.token: This is a description, there's a lot of text, if you can't see it, buy glasses.

description.english: This is a description, there's a lot of text, if you can't see it, buy glasses.
description.russian: Это описание, здесь много текста, если вы его не видите, купите очки.
description.token: This is a description, there's a lot of text, if you can't see it, buy glasses.

description.english: This is a description, there's a lot of text, if you can't see it, buy glasses.
description.russian: Это описание, здесь много текста, если вы его не видите, купите очки.
description.token: This is a description, there's a lot of text, if you can't see it, buy glasses.

description.english: Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down.
description.token: Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down.

description.english: Lose a fight 15 times without dealing damage to your opponent.
description.russian: Проиграть бой 15 раз, не нанеся при этом урона противнику.
description.token: NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_8_10_DESC

description.english: Log into the game during the New Year's Eve event (Usually December 21st to January 4th)
description.russian: Войдите в игру во время новогоднего ивента (обычно с 21 декабря по 4 января).
description.token: NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_8_11_DESC

displayName.english: There will be no New Year
